items.sentence: I might need to stay in Australia until October twentieth.
I remember when you could buy three of these for a dollar.
I think Tom Jackson and Jack Thompson are the same person.
I think skateboards are usually cheaper than rollerblades.
Tom was sitting alone in a corner booth, eating his lunch.
Tom was skiing with his father when the accident happened.
Tom was stuck in a traffic jam for what seemed like hours.
Tom was the mastermind behind the theft of the large ruby.
I never even noticed I\'d lost my wallet until I got home.
I never imagined I\'d be able to give a concert in Boston.
